text: 41|39|Te'omra arau eta nidarsana e'i ye, tumi bhumika sukana dekhibalai poraa, tara pichata yetiya ami tata pani barsana karao tetiya seya ujjiraita arau sphita haya. Niscaya yijane bhumika jiraita karae arasye teraemi mrtasakalaka jirana danakarai. Niscaya te'om sakalo bastura oparata ksamatabana.
